member.name: WS_UTF8_ARRAY_DESCRIPTION
member.summary: This type description is used with and is optional. It is used to specify constraints on the set of values which can be deserialized.

member.name: WS_UTF8_ARRAY_DESCRIPTION.minByteCount
member.summary: Specifies the minimum number of bytes of UTF8 character data.

member.name: WS_UTF8_ARRAY_DESCRIPTION.maxByteCount
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of bytes of UTF8 character data.
